title: [Large-Scale] English Learning and Understanding of British Culture through Immersive Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Conversation and Reading Skills
context.additional_context: Emphasis on iVR experiential learning and group activities using smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three cultural characteristics of London, UK, through an iVR (immersive Virtual Reality) environment.
Learners can use situational dialogues provided in virtual reality to demonstrate at least ten everyday English expressions.
Through team-based problem-solving activities, learners can create creative English responses reflecting cultural differences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
